content: this eye-catching knit vest is a must for your cold weather wardrobe stitched in the soft hand of red heart super saver brushed garment is created with a stocking stitch body that includes accent ribbing along the sides a lusciously loose cowl neck is created in the same ribbing stitch while the addition of slits makes this vest so comfortable to wear practice purl k1 p1 ribbing and twisted ribbing techniques to complete your project attractive on many body types pattern is offered in a range of sizes yarn for model 4 5 6 7 9 11 balls red heart® super saver brushed™ 5 oz/141 g 198 yards/181 m shown in soft mink 5030 sizes to fit bust measurement xs/s 28-34 \ 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 \ 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 \ 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 \ 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 \ 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 \ 142-157 5 cm finished bust xs/s 37 \ 94 cm m 41 \ 104 cm l 45 \ 114 5 cm xl 49 \ 124 5 cm 2/3xl 56 \ 142 cm 4/5xl 63 \ 160 cm
